item.title: List of lists of different length to a data frame
item.description: NOTE The example is not working anymore because the website is down. When scraping data from an internet page it is commun that it is not nicely formatted in table kind of way. To me it happens a lot that you get a list of lists and that the second layer of lists have different lengths. To convert this kind of data can be tricky so I made an example here.
